name: genezilla2bsml
description: convert genezilla GFF output to BSML

options.description: Input file from an genezilla scan. -i, --input_list, will take in a list of input files, all of which will be stored in a single output bsml.
Project ID. Used in creating feature ids.
Needed tp create a Seq-data-import element referencing this path.
Value to be used for the sourcename, required for the analysis section. Most often should be the output_directory for the run.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
